Package dk.anaha.easykv.client

Class EasyKVR

java.lang.Object
dk.anaha.easykv.client.EasyKVR
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class EasyKVR
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
EasyKVR is a EasyKeyValue client which method names that resemble Redis. Should you be familiar with that product then this will come easy to you.

However if you are are not familiar with that product then have a look at EasyKVJava.java which should provide easier adoption. 

 try (EasyKVR kvs = new EasyKVR(tcpPort)){
     kvs.connect();
     // ... your code
 }

Author:
Azri Rosborg

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EasyKVR.EKVWatcherEntry
    EKVWatcherEntry is a container for an active EasyKVWatcher with and assigned key.
